body: This is really cute i love it
I've also decided to make the top of page 24 my profile picture because it's just so adorable :3
Good read, strongly felt the secondhand awkwardness of a cherry-boy lol. Dunno what to feel about kokoro's reactions, someone check her mental age cuz 👁👁 🚨

Senyuu is working on a new MisaKoko!!
Check their twitter ;)

This doujin just feels so precious. Easily one of the best written Bandori doujin available and probably in general. Just one of these moments where rather than masturbating to it or anything I just appreciate it existing. Kinda feel like Misaki here probably should've been Kaoru & Kokoro here should've been Misaki, but no complaints really.

This is one of my all time favorites. The story, dialogue, characters, art style, and the awkward, yet adorable and passionate, first-time sex between them are all beautifully well made. Well written dialogue is one of the best things a doujin can have. Taking the time to explain the characters' relationship, explaining *why* they want to have sex, and having them tell each other what they want and how they're feeling is extremely erotic in all the right ways. Personally I think this is perfect as is but I would love a redrawing with Misaki and/or Kokoro as a futanari :3
@minhanhpd if you always want one of them to have a dick go read yaoi
sweet, would be better if misaki has a dick
Misaki trying to explain her girlfriend what she is doing is the cutest thing I've ever seen
